Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 51st/Campbell
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 61st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, King Drive, 60th, Cottage Grove, and 61st: due to, street blockage near 61st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, King Drive, 60th, Cottage Grove, and 61st: due to, street blockage near 61st/Eberhart.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at California. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at California.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Wellington
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Wellington due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Wellington due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
